thread.title: Oracle awarded $50 million in lawsuit against Rimini Street
thread.title_full: Oracle awarded $50 million in lawsuit against Rimini Street

title: Oracle awarded $50 million in lawsuit against Rimini Street
text:
Oracle awarded $50 million in lawsuit against Rimini Street 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
Oracle has been awarded $50 million in damages in a lawsuit against Rimini Street, which provides software maintenance for Oracle customers....
